resources.string: SELECT S.stop_id stopId, S.stop_name stopName, cast(S.stop_lat AS DECIMAL) stopLatitude, cast(S.stop_lon AS DECIMAL) stopLongitude, CASE WHEN S.wheelchair_boarding = \'1\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END wheelchairBoarding FROM stops_rail S JOIN routes_rail_stops RRS on S.stop_id = RRS.stop_id WHERE RRS.route_id = \"{0}\" AND RRS.direction_id = \"{1}\"

SELECT S.stop_id stopId, S.stop_name stopName, cast(S.stop_lat AS DECIMAL) stopLatitude, cast(S.stop_lon AS DECIMAL) stopLongitude, CASE WHEN S.wheelchair_boarding = \'1\' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END wheelchairBoarding FROM stops_rail S JOIN routes_rail_stops RRS on S.stop_id = RRS.stop_id JOIN routes_rail_stops RRS2 on RRS2.sequence < RRS.sequence WHERE RRS.route_id = \"{0}\" AND RRS.direction_id = \"{1}\" and RRS2.stop_id = {2} and RRS2.route_id = \"{0}\" AND RRS2.direction_id = \"{1}\"
